p: Among the main internal players, there are five the Andalusian Transplant Coordination considers key. One of the most relevant is the professional associations that bring together the main prescribers and professionals who administer these therapies, including doctors, dentists, physiotherapists, podiatrists and nurses. Also key are the scientific societies, especially those of the clinical specialties in which these treatments are most frequently applied as point-of-care treatments through a procedure that encompasses everything from obtaining tissue and blood from patients to processing until administration. Among these scientific societies are the societies of sports medicine, orthopedic surgery and traumatology, aesthetic medicine, dermatology, dentistry, plastic surgery, maxillofacial surgery, oral surgery, general surgery and ophthalmology.
